title: Can we add special characters in our usernames yet?
body: I see a lot of players in most of my matches with special characters in their usernames and I was wondering if it was possible to do it.

replies.body: [**Here's a list**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814#h1q5) of all the special characters allowed, separated by region. Let me know if there's something specific that wasn't covered there!

According to the list you linked me, North America is limited to the numeric and alphabetical letters in summoner names while other regions support letter accents in summoner names. Yet, I see players with the letter accents in their names, but they are from North America.
